医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
动物研究发现，贻贝油在预防动脉粥样硬化方面优于鱼油《营养前沿》中的一项研究表明，贻贝油在预防小鼠动脉粥样硬化方面显着优于鱼油，这表明贻贝油可能是人类心血管健康的优质膳食补充剂。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240214/Mussel-oil-beats-fish-oil-in-atherosclerosis-prevention-animal-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240214/Mussel-oil-beats-fish-oil-in-atherosclerosis-prevention-animal-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8f8da410-6328-4773-8261-42a1de554afc Wed, 14 Feb 2024 23:59:00 -0500 Mussel oil beats fish oil in atherosclerosis prevention, animal study finds
研究强调锻炼是对抗抑郁症的有力工具昆士兰大学的研究表明，运动是对抗抑郁症的有力工具，应作为治疗计划的一部分定期进行。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240214/Study-highlights-exercise-as-a-powerful-tool-to-fight-depression.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240214/Study-highlights-exercise-as-a-powerful-tool-to-fight-depression.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=894942f3-18f3-4dcf-ad77-2541f65a440a Wed, 14 Feb 2024 23:47:29 -0500 Study highlights exercise as a powerful tool to fight depression
医生努力平衡医疗事​​业和养育子女《英国医学杂志》今天的一项独家快照调查显示，为医疗职业所需的不规律且长时间的工作时间提供适当的托儿服务对医生父母来说是一项沉重的经济负担，也是一个令人疲惫不堪的压力源。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240214/Doctors-struggling-to-balance-medical-career-and-parenthood.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240214/Doctors-struggling-to-balance-medical-career-and-parenthood.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5095a641-8bfc-4261-b62b-70ccd6c97492 Wed, 14 Feb 2024 23:40:30 -0500 Doctors struggling to balance medical career and parenthood
新的表观遗传时钟区分衰老的原因和影响是什么导致我们变老？研究人员开发的新“时钟”可能有助于找到答案。麻省总医院布莱根医疗保健系统的创始成员布莱根妇女医院的研究人员推出了一种新型表观遗传时钟——一种旨在根据 DNA 结构预测生物年龄的机器学习模型。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240214/New-epigenic-clocks-distinguish-aging-causes-and-effects.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240214/New-epigenic-clocks-distinguish-aging-causes-and-effects.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2c13dc4c-009a-45d4-bace-4762765f8fed Wed, 14 Feb 2024 23:29:32 -0500 New epigenetic clocks distinguish aging causes and effects
突破性的研究揭示了心脏实现自我修复和再生的潜力发表在《自然心血管研究》上的一项突破性科学研究揭示了一项非凡的发现，可能对心脏病的治疗产生深远的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240214/Groundwriting-study-sheds-light-on-the-pottial-of-the-heart-to-achieve-self-repair-and-regenesis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240214/Groundwriting-study-sheds-light-on-the-pottial-of-the-heart-to-achieve-self-repair-and-regenesis.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=64242066-aeb0-4594-9211-18e0335fead0 Wed, 14 Feb 2024 23:23:46 -0500 Groundbreaking study sheds light on the potential of the heart to achieve self-repair and regeneration
研究揭示 USP1 在尤文肉瘤中的关键作用2024 年 2 月 5 日，《Genes & Cancer》发表了一篇新的研究论文，题为“USP1 在尤文肉瘤中的作用”。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240214/Study-uncovers-ritic-roles-for-USP1-in-Ewing-sarcoma.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240214/Study-uncovers-ritic-roles-for-USP1-in-Ewing-sarcoma.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cbbd82a0-dc02-4d5f-aa94-1a41833a96ea Wed, 14 Feb 2024 23:00:57 -0500 Study uncovers critical roles for USP1 in Ewing sarcoma
透明质酸注射可刺激老化皮肤的持久胶原蛋白更新人体皮肤长期暴露在紫外线下会导致过早衰老或光老化。当皮肤经历光老化时，位于皮肤表层下方真皮中并为皮肤提供强度和支撑的 I 型胶原蛋白束会变得支离破碎。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240214/Hyaluronic-acid-injections-stimulate-long- permanent-collagen-renewal-in-ged-skin.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240214/Hyaluronic-acid-injections-stimulate-long- permanent-collagen-renewal-in-ged-skin.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2874d262-83ad-42b9-9207-7fb9fb8cc73b Wed, 14 Feb 2024 22:04:49 -0500 Hyaluronic acid injections stimulate long-lasting collagen renewal in aged skin
研究表明接触橙剂与神经退行性疾病有关橙剂是越南战争期间使用的一种除草剂，是一种已知的毒素，具有广泛的健康影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240214/Study-links-Agent-Orange-exposure-to-neurodogenic-diseases.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240214/Study-links-Agent-Orange-exposure-to-neurodogenic-diseases.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b741af49-31d8-4c0c-8adb-924d6a4f085f Wed, 14 Feb 2024 21:44:52 -0500 Study links Agent Orange exposure to neurodegenerative diseases
生酮饮食有望抑制酒精使用障碍患者的渴望研究发现，生酮饮食（KD）显着增加血清β-羟基丁酸水平，提示营养性酮症，并显示出减少自我报告的酒精渴望和酒精使用障碍（AUD）患者对酒精的神经生物学渴望特征（NCS）的趋势），表明它有调节酒精渴望的潜力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240214/Ketogenic-diet-shows-promise-in-curbing-cravings-in-alcohol-use-disorder-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240214/Ketogenic-diet-shows-promise-in-curbing-cravings-in-alcohol-use-disorder-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5b97451e-5a7b-4a1a-b525-10f099c36967 Wed, 14 Feb 2024 21:32:00 -0500 Ketogenic diet shows promise in curbing cravings in alcohol use disorder patients
间歇性禁食如何影响肠道微生物组？该综述研究了间歇性禁食 (IF) 对人类肠道微生物群的影响，揭示了对微生物群组成和多样性的不同影响，这些影响受禁食类型、饮食习惯和个体微生物群特征的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240214/How-does-intermittent-fasting-affect-the-gut-microbiome.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240214/How-does-intermittent-fasting-affect-the-gut-microbiome.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6a2d68c4-bbab-4d8d-8610-16b00375b6f1 Wed, 14 Feb 2024 21:13:00 -0500 How does intermittent fasting affect the gut microbiome?
